    <div class="A-EXPCNT-RW-RBWM expander">

            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="1471205152__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="pp_tools_columnControl_11">
    <div class="cc cc-columns-66-33 ">
        
        <div id="pp_tools_columnControlColumn_16" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="pp_tools_richtext_9" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong>1. Do I need to pay to use this feature? </strong></p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">No. This is a free service on the HSBC HK App. All you'll need to do is register for Personal Internet Banking if you haven't already.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"> </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong>2. Will I be able to see transactions on Budget in real time?</strong></p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">It may take up to 3 working days for your balances and individual transactions to be reflected.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"> </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong>3. How many months is Budget able to track?</strong></p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Budget will track and reflect transactions for 12 months including the current month. </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"> </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong>4. Can I link other accounts from other banks to this service?</strong></p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">No. This service is only applicable to only HSBC accounts and credit cards, either joint or sole-named under a customer. </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"> </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong>5. Can I have a statement of my expense breakdown?</strong></p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">There will not be any statements issued based on your expense breakdown. You can view your tailored consolidated expense and trend analysis from the past 6 months directly on the app. </p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>

            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="pp_tools_richtext_10" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong>1. Can I edit my budget? <br> </strong></p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Yes, you can. There are two ways to do this. <br> </p> 
<ul class="A-LSTU-RW-ALL"> 
 <li>On the Budget home tab, select either 'Set budget now' or 'View expense history' Then select 'Set budget'<br> </li> 
</ul> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">OR</p> 
<ul class="A-LSTU-RW-ALL"> 
 <li>Select 'Personalise your view', then 'Budget'<br> </li> 
</ul>
</div></div>

            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="pp_tools_richtext_11" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong>1. Can a primary cardholder view the spending analysis of a supplementary cardholder?</strong><br> </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Yes, primary cardholders are able to view the expense analysis for both their own card and the supplementary card.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">However, supplementary cardholders can only view their own expense analysis but not that of the primary cardholder.<br> </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"> </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong>2. Will transactions from PayMe be included in Budget?</strong></p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">No. However, your PayMe top up expenses from your HSBC account and/or credit card will be reflected (under eWallet top up). </p>
</div></div>
